DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To compare complete denture outcomes conventional digital denture fabrication process . Participants : Sixteen edentulous adult patient University North Carolina School Dentistry Student Clinic seek removable complete denture . Procedures ( method ) : Two complete set dentures fabricate subject : one use conventional process ( A ) use digital process ( B ) . Variability assess research team , treat dental student , independent prosthodontist , patient quantitative measure . Case selection result analysis evaluate recognition Prosthodontic Diagnostic Index .
DOC.brief_title: Conventionally vs. Digitally Fabricated Complete Dentures : Clinical Treatment Outcome Differences
DOC.detailed_description: Rationale Study Design An AB/BA ( conventional=A , digital=B ) crossover design wash-out period flaw study , weakness potential carryover effect ( benefit risk associate treatment A carry treatment B ) . A wash-out period feasible study would require patient-subjects suspend use dentures duration wash-out period . The Investigators decide conduct study use ABB/BAA crossover design , require wash-out period permit test discount possible carryover effect . In addition , design appropriate small sample size AB/BA design . The investigator add scant literature digital denture , information never study - retention , aesthetic , stability digital denture compare conventional denture . Additionally , investigator longitudinal data characteristic regard digital denture . If Functional Assessment Dentures ( FAD ) patient evaluation show positive result digital denture , could lead increase use Computer -Aided Design/ Computer -Aided Manufacturing ( CADCAM ) fabrication method , turn , would allow great number people benefit advantage digital denture describe early application ( e.g. , good fit , few visit less time chair , less biofilm formation , etc . )
DOC.criteria: 1 . UNC School Dentistry Student Clinic patient require maxillary mandibular complete denture 2 . Ages 18 99 , inclusive 3 . Able read , speak , understand English 4 . Without natural tooth implant support overdentures 5 . Edentulous jaw least 6 month 6 . Any Prosthodontic Diagnostic Index ( PDI ) type preference give Types 13 1 . Nonregistered patient UNC School Dentistry student clinic 2 . Patient able unwilling give consent 3 . Subject extraction within last 6 month
